ComicInfo.Title: A Savage Sting Has--the Scorpion!
ComicInfo.Summary:
After The Scorpion broke out of a mental institution, he vowed revenge against Jonah Jameson once again. This time, he did so by attacking the retailers and outlets selling the Bugle's papers in an attempt to drive Jameson out of business.
Eventually, he attacked the Bugle itself and kidnapped the publisher of the company. Spider-Man teamed up with Captain America in this issue and successfully put the villain out of action while once again severing his scorpion tail from the costume.
